column3: 6 add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl
4 add-add the chopped cilantro to the bowl
5 crack-crack one egg in a bowl
7 Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl
8 Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan
9 cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour
10 Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan
11 put-put tomatoes on a serving plate
12 Pour-Pour the egg mixture into the pan
13 stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space
15 Transfer-Transfer omelette to the plate and serve with the tomatoes
